Name: Extraneous task/missing function
Description: Expressing potential for development, through unnecessary-feeling tasks as well as missing devices and features.
Example violation: “There's a table missing from next to the operating table. For example, when we're cannulating the patient, we have no place to put all the equipment on.”

Name: Inadequate device performance
Description: Manufacturing errors and other issues with measurable performance where the device did not improve the status quo.
Example violation: “It was kind of a disappointment to realize that the thermal power            [of the heated mattress]             is so small. I mean, you can feel that it is warm with your hand, but it won't influence the patient's thermo-economy at all.”
